content: the oval shaped base of the purse is worked in a continuous spiral the purse body is worked in joined turned rounds finished measurements width 15 height 12 not including handles materials premier® yarns raffia™ 100% cellulose rayon 3 5oz/100g 131yds/120m 2166-09 sage 3 balls hook us size h-8 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle locking stitch marker gauge 11 single_crochet x 12 rnds = 4 2 patt reps = 3 wide save time check your gauge skills/techniques used in this pattern single and double_crochet stitches working in joined turned rounds working in a continuous spiral
